headline: Why Is American International Group, Inc. (AIG) Among Diamond Hill Capital’s Top Stock Picks?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Diamond Hill Capital’s Top 10 Stock Picks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where American International Group, Inc. (NYSE:AIG) stands against Diamond Hill Capital’s other stock picks. Heather Brilliant’s Diamond Hill Capital is a Columbus, Ohio-based investment management firm founded in 1997 by Ric Dillon, […]
